TopicTitle: KSP screen shrinking if settings are changed.

Articles.Content:
pretty much as it says on the title. My modded (although I have experienced this behavior on an unmodded install as well) game on OS X whatever the second most recent major release is. when ever i change the settings from any method ( settings screen, in the flight scene) my screen switches from a rectangle to a square and the numbers pop out of the dials. A revert to launch fixes the dials, but the screen is still small.
